data.name: plSrc.Help
data.value: Enter the source (Url) of the content to display in the IFrame

data.name: plWidth.Help
data.value: Enter the width of the IFrame

data.name: plHeight.Help
data.value: Enter the height of the IFrame

data.name: plTitle.Help
data.value: Enter a title for the IFrame

data.name: plScrolling.Help
data.value: Select the scrollbars style (yes, no or auto)

data.name: plBorder.Help
data.value: Choose whether you want a border around the IFrame

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About The IFrame Module

The IFrame Module displays content from another website within a frame on your portal.

Edit IFrame Properties

  1. Add an IFrame module, or go to an existing IFrame module.
  2. Click Edit IFrame Properties.
  3. At Source, enter the Url of the content to be displayed.
  4. At Width, enter the width of the IFrame.
  5. At Height, enter the height of the IFrame.
  6. At Title, enter a title for the IFrame.
  7. At Scrolling, select Auto, No or Yes to set the scroll bar properties.
  8. At Border, select Yes or No to set the border properties.
  9. Click Update.

data.name: valWidth.Text
data.value: Width must be a number greater than zero

data.name: valHeight.Text
data.value: Height must be a number greater than zero
